text: Pointe-à-Pitre is the second-most populous city in the French overseas department of Guadeloupe, after Les Abymes. In 2019, 15,181 people lived there. In 2018, 250,952 people lived in the urban area.Comparateur de territoire, INSEE Pointe-à-Pitre International Airport, Guadeloupe's main international airport, is north of downtown Pointe-à-Pitre in the commune of Les Abymes. == References == Category:Communes in Guadeloupe Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Pointe-à-Pitre
